translations: [昆] 产卵器；[昆] 产卵管

sentences.sentence: Insects use chemoreceptors on ovipositors, mouthparts, antennae or tarsi to detect marking pheromones.
sentences.translation: 植食性昆虫的寄主标记信息素只产在寄主表面，用触角或产卵器检测。

sentences.sentence: Parasitoid wasps and flies use their long ovipositors to thrust their eggs into the eggs and bodies of other insects.
sentences.translation: 寄生蜂和一些苍蝇会利用自己细长的产卵器将卵产在其他昆虫的卵内。
